data.name: K.Madhan
data.description: Passionate Flutter developer with a knack for creating sleek and functional mobile applications
data.about: I am a passionate Flutter developer from Chennai, who thrives on coding and continuously updating my skills. With a deep love for problem-solving, I am driven to achieve challenging targets , I am excited about the future possibilities in mobile app development.

projects.title: Deepee Inks
description: Request a quote: Users can request a quote for a product or service by filling out a form with details such as product name, quantity, delivery location.

Review and approve quotes: After submitting a quote request, the user can review and approve the quote before the order is processed. The user may also be able to negotiate the quote with the seller before approving it.
Manage quotes: Users can manage their quotes, where they can view the status of their quotes, accept or reject quotes, and track the progress of their orders.
Payment options: The app should support various payment options such as credit cards, debit cards, and other payment gateways to facilitate secure and convenient transactions.

projects.title: Instagram Clone
description: This application is built using Flutter ,a cross-platform mobile development framework.
It uses Google and Facebook authentication to allow users to sign in, and Riverpod for state management.
The database is Cloud Firestore, a NoSQL database that is scalable and reliable.Users can post images or videos, and other users can comment and like or dislike the posts.
Users can also delete posts that they have posted.This application is a great way to share your thoughts and experiences with others, and to connect with people who share your interests.

projects.title: Movie Application
description: This application is built using Flutter, a cross-platform mobile development framework.
It uses the Movie Database API to get data about movies, and Riverpod for state management.
Flutter Hooks are also implemented, which allows for more concise and expressive code.
Dynamic themes are available, so users can change the look and feel of the application to match their preferences.
Filter options are available, so users can narrow down the results to find the movies that they are interested in.

projects.title: Todo App
description: This application is built using Flutter, a cross-platform mobile development framework.
It uses the Hive Database  to get data about todo, and Riverpod for state management.
Flutter Hooks are also implemented, which allows for more concise and expressive code.
Dynamic themes are available, so users can change the look and feel of the application to match their preferences.
Filter options are available, so users can narrow down the results to find the movies that they are interested in.
